Pre-Game Insights: The Angels are calling up a pair of top pitching prospects for this weekend’s series against the Mariners in Anaheim.
Caden Dana, MLB Pipeline's No. 74 prospect and the top Angels prospect, will make his MLB debut on Sunday at home against the Mariners.
Left-hander Samuel Aldegheri, the club's No. 8 prospect, is being recalled and will start Friday's series opener against Seattle.
Angels manager Ron Washington expressed excitement about watching Dana pitch, noting his experience gained since Spring Training.
Washington mentioned that Aldegheri has received great reports and is looking forward to seeing how he handles himself.
